title: How to switch back?
body: how do you switch back to the original client? i updated it a long time ago but i think i like the one before it. any way to change it back?

replies.body:
Broporo oooooon duty! {{summoner:31}} 

Once you launch the client, if you look in the bottom right hand corner you should see a button that says "Launch Legacy Client". Once you click that, the client should close and restart with the original one you're used to! 

Here's a handy picture that better shows where the button is too ^_^!

https://i.gyazo.com/a513dc7c89a60230b1c4feb78247b3b5.png
still no one gunna gimme a helpful answer?
